Add Unemployment Periods at the End of Employment Histories (Legacy)

Source: R/add_unemployment_tail.R
add_unemployment_tail.Rd

This function is maintained for backward compatibility. It calls the new \codeadd_unemployment_periods() function with \codeadd_tail = TRUE and \codeadd_head = FALSE.

Usage

add_unemployment_tail(vecshift_data, max_date, min_tail_duration = 1L)

Arguments

vecshift_data

A data.table output from vecshift()

max_date

Date or numeric. The end date for unemployment tails

min_tail_duration

Integer. Minimum duration for unemployment tails (default: 1)

Value

A data.table with unemployment tail periods added

See also

\code\linkadd_unemployment_periods for the enhanced version with head/tail options

On this page
